about.title: {{ .name }} version {{ .version }}
about.desc: Discord bot dedicated to the {{ .game.Name }} game!

support.title: :bulb: Support server
support.desc: You have a problem with its use? A suggestion ? Feel free to join the [Discord server]({{ .discord }}) !

twitter.title: <:twitter:1100040368445206619> Twitter
twitter.desc: I'm also on [Twitter]({{ .twitter }}): you will find the last news!

opensource.title: <:github:372093338628784148> Open source
opensource.desc: All my source code is licensed under GPL-3.0 and accessible on [Github]({{ .github }})

free.title: :money_with_wings: Free
free.desc: All features are free. You can participate financially but do not go into the red! [Paypal]({{ .paypal }})

privacy.title: :shield: Data privacy
privacy.desc: I take care to collect the strict minimum data needed to run. More informations on the support server!

about.footer: Some illustrations are the Ankama Studio property - All rights reserved

believers.title: Aligned list
believers.description:
{{ if .believers }}{{ range .believers}}{{ .City }} {{ .Order }} lvl. {{ .Level }}: **{{ .Username }}**
{{ end }}{{ else }}No aligned found at this moment!{{ end }}

beliefs.title: {{ .username }} alignments
beliefs.description:
{{ if .beliefs }}{{ range .beliefs}}{{ .City }} {{ .Order }} lvl. {{ .Level }}
{{ end }}{{ else }}No alignment for the moment!{{ end }}

day.title: Almanax of <t:{{ .date }}:D>
day.missing: Oops! I don't have the almanax of this day in my knowledge, I go back this problem to my creators!

effect.missing: My crystal ball tells me that the desired bonus will not intervene in the next thirty days, I unfortunately not know more :persevere:

resource.title: Almanax of <t:{{ .startDate }}:D> to <t:{{ .endDate }}:D>
resource.description:
{{ if .tributes }}{{ range .tributes}}- **{{ .ItemName }}** x{{ .Quantity }}
{{ end }}{{ else }}No needed resource!{{ end }}

embed.description: {{ if .server }}{{ .server.Emoji }} **{{ .server.Name }}** is the current guild server!{{ else }}No {{ .game.Name }} server is linked to the guild!{{ end }}

server.name: {{ .game.Emoji }} Channels linked to servers
server.value:
{{ if .channels}}{{ range .channels }}{{ .Channel }} {{ .Server.Emoji }} **{{ .Server.Name }}**
{{ end }}{{ else }}No configured channels!{{ end }}

webhook.name: :bell: Notified channels
webhook.value:
{{ if .channels}}{{ range .channels }}{{ .Channel }} {{ .Provider.Emoji }} **{{ .Provider.Name }}** ({{.Language}})
{{ end }}{{ else }}No configured channels!{{ end }}

effects.title: Effects
effects.description:
{{ if .effects }}{{ range .effects}}{{ if .Emoji }}{{ .Emoji }} {{ end }}{{ .Label }}
{{ end }}{{ else }}No effect!{{ end }}

recipe.title: Recipe
recipe.description:
{{ if .ingredients }}{{ range .ingredients}}**{{ .Quantity }}**x [{{ .Name }}]({{ .URL }})
{{ end }}{{ else }}No ingredient!{{ end }}

craftsmen.title: {{ .job }}s list
craftsmen.description:
{{ if .craftsmen }}{{ range .craftsmen}}Lvl. {{ .Level }}: **{{ .Username }}**
{{ end }}{{ else }}No craftsman found at this moment!{{ end }}

craftsman.title: {{ .username }} jobs
craftsman.description:
{{ if .jobs }}{{ range .jobs}}{{ .Job }} Lvl. {{ .Level }}
{{ end }}{{ else }}No job for the moment!{{ end }}

items.title: Items
items.description:
{{ if .items }}{{ range .items}}{{ .Name }}, lvl {{ .Level }}
{{ end }}{{ else }}No item!{{ end }}

effects.title: Effects ({{ .itemNumber }} items)
effects.description:
{{ if .effects }}{{ range .effects}}{{ if .Emoji }}{{ .Emoji }} {{ end }}{{ .Label }}
{{ end }}{{ else }}No effect!{{ end }}

date.constraints: The date must respect the following format: DD/MM/YYYY :)
date.outOfBounds: This date is out of my knowledge! I know I'm amazing but still, I'm not Xelor god! :face_with_peeking_eye:

dimension.not_found: Aie! '*{{ .value }}*' does not correspond to any dimensions I know! :pensive:
dimension.too_many: Outch! '*{{ .value }}*' matches too many dimensions ({{ if .collection }}{{$first := true}}{{ range .collection}}{{if $first}}{{$first = false}}{{else}}, {{end}}{{ . }}{{ end }}{{ end }})! If you want to get all, don't fill this option :slight_smile:

duration.constraints: The duration must be between {{ .min }} and {{ .max }} days :)

feed.not_found: Aie! '*{{ .value }}*' does not correspond to any RSS feeds I know! :pensive:
feed.too_many: Outch! '*{{ .value }}*' matches too many RSS feeds ({{ if .collection }}{{$first := true}}{{ range .collection}}{{if $first}}{{$first = false}}{{else}}, {{end}}{{ . }}{{ end }}{{ end }})! :slight_smile:

job.not_found: Aie! '*{{ .value }}*' does not correspond to any jobs I know! :pensive:
job.too_many: Outch! '*{{ .value }}*' matches too many jobs ({{ if .collection }}{{$first := true}}{{ range .collection}}{{if $first}}{{$first = false}}{{else}}, {{end}}{{ . }}{{ end }}{{ end }})! :slight_smile:

level.constraints: The level must be between {{ .min }} and {{ .max }}! :grin:

server.required: Oops! It seems no {{ .game.Name }} server is linked to your guild (or your channel), use the server option like `/pos server Djaul` or link your guild to a server with `/config server` command :grin:
server.not_found: Aie! '*{{ .value }}*' does not correspond to any servers I know! :pensive:
server.too_many: Outch! '*{{ .value }}*' matches too many servers ({{ if .collection }}{{$first := true}}{{ range .collection}}{{if $first}}{{$first = false}}{{else}}, {{end}}{{ . }}{{ end }}{{ end }})! Retry by selecting an existing one in the list :slight_smile:

permission.webhook: I don't have the right to manage webhooks! Sorry I can't do anything more without this permission :(

panic: I have encountered an error :frowning:... This will be processed as soon as possible!
Oops, it seems I've crashed... I'm reporting this event to my creators, sorry!
